text: Elhadji Mour Samb (born 8 January 1994) is a Senegalese professional footballer who plays as a forward for Saint Louis FC in the USL Championship. ==Club career== ===Tromsø=== On 3 August 2018, Samb left Tromsø by mutual consent. ===Ottawa Fury=== Samb signed with Canadian side Ottawa Fury FC on 15 February 2019, after a successful trial. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Senegalese footballers Category:Senegalese expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in France Category:Senegalese expatriate sportspeople in France Category:Expatriate footballers in Norway Category:Senegalese expatriate sportspeople in Norway Category:Expatriate soccer players in Canada Category:Senegalese expatriate sportspeople in Canada Category:Diambars FC players Category:Lille OSC players Category:Tromsø IL players Category:Ottawa Fury FC players Category:Saint Louis FC players Category:Senegal Premier League players Category:Championnat National 2 players Category:Eliteserien players Category:USL Championship players Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Senegalese expatriate sportspeople in the United States
title: Elhadji Mour Samb
